item.title: #11 - Productivity
item.description: The Question: How much do you care about money?. The Topic: Becoming way too obsessed with productivity. The Viewermail: A listener wants to blow me.

item.title: #11 - Productivity
item.description: the_question How much do you care about money? Are you one of those hardcore capitalists? Where you dream of decapitating socialists by the mouthful. In my case, I would say I care about money more than the average person. I have a mortgage and I am firmly entrenched in the rat race. Plus, money is sexy. You tried masturbating with a dollar bill? It’s delicious. the_topic Productivity I used to be obsessed with productivity.
